sense.def:
To withdraw something from a place
pomeni nekaj odstraniti ali vzeti z nekega kraja.

seg.quote: She withdrew the key from the door.
You must present your cheque card when you withdraw any money.

sense.def:
To withdraw to another room
pomeni iti v drugo sobo.

seg.quote: He withdrew to his office to count the money.

sense.def:
Kadar čete
withdraw
, zapustijo kraj, kjer se bojujejo ali kjer imajo postojanko.

seg.quote: We could see the force withdrawing.
They are willing to withdraw some troops.

sense.def:
To withdraw from an activity
pomeni ne več sodelovati pri neki dejavnosti.

To withdraw a remark or statement
pomeni reči, naj se ljudje ne menijo za pripombo ali trditev, ki smo jo izrekli.

seg.quote: I want to withdraw a statement I made earlier on.
